thread.title_full: Bali Thailand Tour Package at Colorful Vacations: Perfect Destination for Fun (Pratibha Bajaj)

title: Bali Thailand Tour Package at Colorful Vacations: Perfect Destination for Fun (Pratibha Bajaj)
text: By Pratibha Bajaj Sep 20, 2015 Bali is an island of magic, wonder & unspoiled beauty located in Indonesia. Here you can see the exact meaning of scenic beauty & breathtaking beaches. You can experience the calming ambiance, natural & pure environment & heavenly feel. Bali is renowned for its beaches, volcanoes & various animals like elephants, tigers and Komodo dragons. Thailand is a country located in Southeast Asia which is visited by huge number of travelers because of its amazing tropical beaches, opulent royal palaces, ancient ruins and ornate temples. Bali & Thailand offers the perfect ambiance for the holiday-makers in order to travelers make their journey more enjoyable. Package Inclusions: * Transfer and tours with private air conditioned car in Bali * English speaking guide *3 nights' accommodation at the hotel (Ramada Camakila/ similar) * 3x breakfast at hotel *1x full day Kintamani Tour incl. Indonesian buffet lunch *Water-sport activities such as 1x jet ski, 1x parasailing, 1x banana boat incl. return transfer and Indian lunch * 2x Indian dinner at local restaurant (food only) incl. return transfer *1x Sunset Dinner Cruise incl. all entertainment onboard and return transfer * 21% Government tax and service charge *02 nights stay at Bangkok Hotel ( Royal Park View / similar) *02 nights stay at Pattaya Hotel (Royal Palace Hotel Pattaya / similar) * Half day Temple and City tour in Bangkok *Coral Island tour with lunch in Pattaya * Return transfers on seat in coach basis Package Exclusions:
